channel.title: Adding/Removeing/Priceing Items in your shops
channel.description:
Tittle says pretty much all, i want to know how to edit items in my shop such as add remove and price them.
I'm useing figments source.
Please provide i detailed reply, i had one before that made no sense.
-Thanks

item.title: Adding/Removeing/Priceing Items in your shops
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

I guess, its nice to understand

also

61608.0013642381 < Shop price
61608.0013642381 < shop sell Price
80929.5918252946 < Alch price

Though it was like that Can be wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Adding/Removeing/Priceing Items in your shops
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Adding/removing items;
Shops.cfg
It’s pretty self-explanitory when you get in there ;).
Adding/changing prices;
Item.cfg.
Inside search for the item you want,i’ll be using whip as an example.
Search for your item. (4151 In this case)
You’ll see something like this;

item = 4151	Abyssal_whip	A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	[b]61608.0013642381	61608.0013642381	80929.5918252946[/b]	0	82	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	82	0

I don’t know exactly which one is the price one but it’s one of the 3 bold numbers in the peice of code.

Sorry for the lack of ‘info’ i provided you with.

Read full topic
